Package it.uniba.chessboard

Class Chessboard

java.lang.Object
it.uniba.chessboard.Chessboard
public class Chessboard
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class of Chessboard
Responsibility
This class can:
- create the chessboard
- show the chessboard
- update the chessboard when a piece is moved
This class know:
- all pieces class methods
- "History" class methods
- "Check" class methods

This class is " control ".
